title: Arugula Salad with Prosciutto and Pears
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Arugula Salad with Prosciutto and Pears a try. This recipe serves 4. One portion of this dish contains about 13g of protein, 25g of fat, and a total of 340 calories. For $2.61 per serving, this recipe covers 17% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and primal diet. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. If you have arugula, wine vinegar, parmesan cheese, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the olive oil you could follow this main course with the Sauteed Banana, Granolan and Yogurt Parfait as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 55%. This score is solid. Similar recipes include Prosciutto with Pears and Arugula, Pears & Arugula Wrapped In Prosciutto, and Arugula Salad with Pears and Gorgonzola.
instructions: Combine first 5 ingredients in a large bowl.                                                                                                 Combine vinegar and next 3 ingredients in a small bowl, stirring with a whisk. Drizzle over salad, and toss gently to coat.                                                                                                Serve with: French Bread with Herbed Goat Cheese Spread

steps.step: Combine first 5 ingredients in a large bowl.
Combine vinegar and next 3 ingredients in a small bowl, stirring with a whisk.
Drizzle over salad, and toss gently to coat.
Serve with: French Bread with Herbed Goat Cheese
